alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 9:57PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lee, northwestern Sumter, eastern Richland and southwestern Kershaw Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 956 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lugoff, or 8 miles southwest of Camden, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sumter, Camden, Shaw Air Base, Lugoff, Oakland, Elgin, Ashwood, Dalzell, Dinkins Mill, Spring Hill, Boykin, Cherryvale, Wateree River Correctional Institution, Rembert, Stateburg, and Woodrow. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 85 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
